document.full_text: hundreds of people marched in southern syria for a fifth straight day on tuesday, protesting against the government of president bashar al-assad and shouting "freedom, freedom. peaceful, peaceful."
document.title: protesters march in south syria for fifth day
lines_and_colors: hundreds of people marched in southern syria for a fifth straight day on tuesday, protesting against the government of president bashar al-assad and shouting "freedom, freedom. peaceful, peaceful."
